name: Nyakalong Home
pTag:
SUPPORT FOR NYAKALONG HOME 
Nyakalong Home in Sebokeng is a Non-Profit â€“Organisation that provides shelter for children living with physical and mental disability. Nyakalong Home currently houses 25 children ranging from ages 6 to 35. In June 2019 LTE Consulting made a donation to Nyakalong home to assist with groceries; basic supplies; blankets; heaters and has procured 2 hospital beds and 10 wheel chairs. In conjunction with Maponya Ambulances, LTE through Mr. Thulani Majola has undertaken to continue assisting this home into the future.
